  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Galí: Aprofundiment: Les consonants</string>
            <string language="en">Galí: Consolidation. The consonants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galí: Verdichtung. Die Konsonanten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galí : Fusion. Les consonnes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Galí: Consolidação. As consoantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Galí: Consolidamento. Le consonanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galν: Σταθεροποίηση. Τα σύμφωνα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Activitats interactives adreçades a l'alumnat nouvingut. Inclouen la presentació i la pràctica de l'alfabet català. S'hi treballen els dígrafs, les lletres compostes i les consonants que tenen més d'un valor fonètic. L'aprenent pot escoltar, veure la forma escrita i imitar models orals.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive activities aimed at pupils who have recently moved to Catalonia. Presentation and practice of the Catalan alphabet, especially digraphs, compound letters and consonants. Learners hear and see the written forms, and imitate oral models.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comunicació oral</string>
            <string language="en">speech communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Aktivitäten strebten Schüler an, die
vor kurzem nach Katalonien umgezogen sind. Darstellung und 
Praxis des katalanischen Alphabetes, besonders Digraphe, 
zusammengesetzte Zeichen und Konsonanten. Anfänger hören und 
sehen die schriftlichen Formulare und ahmen Mundmodelle nach.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les activités interactives ont visé les élèves
qui se sont récemment déplacés en Catalogne. Présentation et
pratique de l'alphabet catalan, particulièrement digraphes, lettres 
composées et consonnes. Les étudiants entendent et voient les 
formes écrites, et imitent les modèles oraux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As atividades interativas visaram os alunos que se
têm movido recentemente para Catalonia. Apresentação e 
prática do alfabeto catalan, especial digraphs, letras compostas e 
consoantes. Os learners ouvem e vêem os formulários escritos, 
e imitate modelos orais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le attività interattive hanno puntato sugli 
allievi che recentemente si sono mossi in Catalogna. 
Presentazione e pratica dell'alfabeto catalan, particolarmente 
digrammi, lettere compound e consonanti. I principianti sentono 
e vedono le forme scritte ed imitano i modelli orali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικές δραστηριότητες που στοχεύουν στους μαθητές 
που έχουν κινηθεί πρόσφατα προς την Καταλωνία. Παρουσίαση 
και πρακτική του καταλανικού αλφάβητου, ειδικά διγράμματα, 
σύνθετες επιστολές και σύμφωνα. Οι αρχάριοι ακούνε και 
βλέπουνε τις γραπτές μορφές, και μιμούνται τα προφορικά 
μοντέλα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechfunkanlage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission de la parole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma comunicação de discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">communicazione verbale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεκτική επικοινωνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
